body_html: Without all my modifications here, several Eugenio's networks won't work. They have Padding.nInputDim=3 and Padding.index=1 (1-based Torch indexes), so Padding.index has to become 2, because the input is 4D instead of 3D. Then they have a View to 1D, followed by a Linear.
body_text: Without all my modifications here, several Eugenio's networks won't work. They have Padding.nInputDim=3 and Padding.index=1 (1-based Torch indexes), so Padding.index has to become 2, because the input is 4D instead of 3D. Then they have a View to 1D, followed by a Linear.
body: Without all my modifications here, several Eugenio's networks won't work. They have Padding.nInputDim=3 and Padding.index=1 (1-based Torch indexes), so Padding.index has to become 2, because the input is 4D instead of 3D. Then they have a View to 1D, followed by a Linear.
